Missions

Beginner missions — learn by doing with short, focused challenges.

mission_01

First Flight

Make the drone take off and land safely.

beginner
12 MIN
mission_02

Forward Motion

Move forward 2 meters and return to start.

beginner
10 MIN
mission_03

Climb & Descend

Climb to 3 meters, move forward, then descend and land.

beginner
12 MIN
mission_04

Square Pattern

Fly a 2m × 2m square and return to start.

beginner
18 MIN
mission_05

Precision Hover

Ascend to 2 meters, hold position, then land precisely.

beginner
8 MIN
mission_06

Back To Base

Move forward then return using move_backward and land safely.

beginner
9 MIN
mission_07

Precision Landing

Land within 0.5m of the start position after a short flight.

beginner
14 MIN
mission_08

Figure Eight

Combine lateral and forward movements to trace a figure‑eight pattern.

beginner
20 MIN
mission_09

Altitude Control

Practice ascending and descending smoothly between heights.

beginner
11 MIN
mission_10

Timed Run

Complete a short course within 20 seconds.

beginner
15 MIN
